message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
